Grimmsnarl (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0860: Morgrem
Pokémon
#0862: Obstagoon →

Grimmsnarl has been featured on 8 different cards since it debuted in the Rebel Clash expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Grimmsnarl cards are normally Darkness-type or Psychic-type Stage 2 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Grimmsnarl

Grimmsnarl
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English

Expansion 		Rarity #

Grimmsnarl Fusion Strike 178/264 Eevee Heroes 054/069
Grimmsnarl Brilliant Stars 094/172 Start Deck 100   288/414
Grimmsnarl Stellar Crown 096/142 Stellar Miracle 066/102
Grimmsnarl Journey Together 073/159 Generations Start Deck Zacian ex & Alcremie ex   058/175
